page.title: 08A TYPICAL WEEKDAY
page.content: I wake at 7:30am and leave the house at 8:15am.The journey of 8 miles to my office at Ensleigh on the North side of Bath takes about 20 minutes using my car or motorcycle.The latter is easier and quicker on the busy roads. I work as a Civil Servant in the Ministry of Defence.We use computers as much as possible but still clerical and administrative staff to deal with non routine matters such as in my office. I have no fixed time for lunch, sandwiches made by my wife or sometimes a snack at a{pub}with colleagues. I leave the office at 5:30pm and have dinner at 6:00pm. I read the paper,then work in the garden until 9:30.I go to bed with my Wife at 11:45pm.
